

$$
\underline{\large No \ Climate \ Effect \ Scenario}  \\
\begin{aligned}
dS/dt &= rr - \beta \times S \times I / N - mr \times S \\
dI/dt &= \beta \times S \times I / N - (mr +  \phi  + \gamma) \times I \\ 
dR/dt &= \gamma \times I - mr \times R \\
\end{aligned}

$$

$$
\underline{\large Climate \ Effect \ Scenarios}  \\
\begin{aligned}
dS/dt &= (rr +  \sigma_1 \times T) - (\beta + \sigma_2 \times T) \times S \times I / N - (mr + \sigma_3 \times T)  \times S \\
dI/dt &= (\beta + \sigma_2 \times T) \times S \times I / N - [(mr +  \phi  + \sigma_3 \times T) + (\gamma + \sigma_4 \times T)] \times I \\
dR/dt &= (\gamma + \sigma_4 \times T) \times I - (mr  + \sigma_3 \times T) \times R
\end{aligned}

$$




$$
When \ Year  \geq  Year_{Max} / \ 2, \ \ \sigma_2 = -1 \times \sigma_2; \ else\ \  \sigma_2 = 1 \times \sigma_2 \\ 

$$



$$
\underline{\large Model \ Parameters}  \\
\begin{aligned}
\ S &= Number \ of \ Susceptible \ Plants \\
\ I &= Number \ of \ Infected \ Plants \\
\ R &= Number \ of \ Recovered \ Plants \\
\ t &= Time \ in \ Growing \ Season \\
\ T &= Years \ After \ Simulation \ Start \\ 
\ rr &= Recruitment \ Rate \\
\ mr &= Mortality \ Rate \\
\beta &= Transmission \ Rate \\
\phi &= Added \ Disease \ Mortality \\
\gamma &= Recovery \ Rate
\end{aligned}

$$



$$
\underline{\large  Slope\ of \ Climate \ Effect \ On: }  \\
\begin{aligned}
\sigma_1 &:  Recruitment \ Rate  \\
\sigma_2 &:  Transmission \ Rate\\
\sigma_3 &:  Mortality \ Rate \\
\sigma_4 &:  Recovery \ Rate \\
\end{aligned}

$$
